techmeme.title: The NYT Tech Guild, with 600+ members, reaches a tentative deal with management on a contract enhancing job security, setting flexible hybrid schedules, more (Katie Robertson/New York Times)
Google rolls out two updates to Android's unknown tracker alerts feature, letting users pause location updates from their phone and pinpoint unfamiliar trackers (Sheena Vasani/The Verge)
Adobe reports Q4 revenue up 11% YoY to $5.61B, vs. $5.54B est., Digital Media revenue up 12%, forecasts FY 2025 revenue below est.; ADBE drops 8%+ after hours (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
The ultrawide Mac display option in visionOS 2.2 is very close to being a killer app and makes the Vision Pro's price feel a little closer to right (Wes Davis/The Verge)
Ayar Labs, which develops optical interconnects, raised a $155M Series D from Advent Global, Light Street, Nvidia, AMD, Intel, and others at a $1B+ valuation (Jane Lanhee Lee/Bloomberg)
